entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
